content: The web-hook doesn't seem to be triggering anymore. @Grahame Grieve @Josh Mandel ?
I see other IG ci build notifications are being sent. However, it appears that the web-hook is not triggering for HL7/fhir-skin-wound-ig
It didn't seem to fire for SDC either when I triggered a re-build from the IG list webpage
thanks for the at-mention. I'm outside of good internet range most of the next few days -- does it look like an intermittent problem, or is it fully broken?
Richard and I are both seeing the issue. Not sure if there's something different with our IGs or if it's an intermittent issue and we just both happen to be 'lucky'...
May not help, but I can confirm it did not pick up my commit to the genomics-reporting IG today as well.
@Josh Mandel there's a raised likelihood of the IG publisher failing right now
My web-hook (eCR) seems to be working now (it wasn't last night). Also I'm back to 0 bad links - thanks @Grahame Grieve!
Yay! It's listening to me again. Thank you (to whoever made the fix)
